News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 21,153 Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank allotted 21,153 equity shares of ₹2 face value each under Employee Stock Unit Scheme-2022 on February 06, 2026, approved by Executive Directors.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth Rs. 136.88 Crores
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant NSE block trade worth Rs. 136.88 crores involving 1,023,413 shares at Rs. 1337.50 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 765,234 Equity Shares Under ESOP
News.Summary: ICICI Bank Limited allotted 765,234 equity shares of face value Rs.2 each under its Employee Stock Option Scheme-2000 on January 30, 2026, approved by Executive Directors.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth Rs. 69.27 Crores
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE worth Rs. 69.27 crores involving approximately 505,725 shares at Rs. 1369.80 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 12,966 Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank Limited has allotted 12,966 equity shares of face value ₹2 each under its Employee Stock Unit Scheme-2022, approved by Executive Directors on January 22, 2026.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹60.55 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 445,169 shares valued at ₹60.55 crores, executed at ₹1,360.10 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹76.39 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 563,237 shares valued at ₹76.39 crores, executed at ₹1,356.20 per share, indicating institutional investor activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹202.65 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 1,490,066 shares worth ₹202.65 crores at ₹1,360.00 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity in the banking stock.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Seeks Shareholder Approval for New Director
News.Summary: ICICI Bank initiates postal ballot for appointing Ms. Vijayalakshmi Iyer as Independent Director. Remote e-voting opens January 27, 2026, with results expected by February 27, 2026.

News.Title: Prabhudas Lilladher Sets ₹1,800 Target for ICICI Bank
News.Summary: Brokerage maintains 'BUY' rating on ICICI Bank despite soft quarter performance, citing improved loan growth momentum and management stability with CEO term extension till September 2028.

News.Title: Anand Rathi Sets ₹1,713 Target for ICICI Bank
News.Summary: Anand Rathi maintains BUY rating on ICICI Bank with ₹1,713 target price, citing accelerated credit growth of 11.5% y/y and stable asset quality despite seasonal weakness.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 275,884 Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank allotted 275,884 equity shares of ₹2.00 face value each under its Employee Stock Option Scheme-2000 on January 19, 2026, approved by Executive Directors.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Extends CEO Bakhshi's Term Till 2028
News.Summary: ICICI Bank board approves Sandeep Bakhshi's reappointment as MD & CEO for two more years from October 2026. AU Small Finance Bank partners with ICSI for banking solutions to Company Secretaries.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹23.57 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 168,567 shares worth ₹23.57 crores at ₹1,398.40 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity in the banking stock.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Expects Stable NIMs From Q4 FY26
News.Summary: ICICI Bank anticipates stable net interest margins from Q4 FY26 amid retail deposit adjustments. Loan growth momentum expected to continue into Q4 FY26 following Q3 rise, excluding credit cards.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Q3: Expert Says Short-term Volatility Possible
News.Summary: Aditya Shah of Hercules Advisors expects potential short-term stock pressure for ICICI Bank despite stable fundamentals, citing temporary provisioning factors in Q3 results.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Q3 Preview: PAT Growth Up to 7.5% YoY Expected
News.Summary: Analysts forecast ICICI Bank's Q3FY26 PAT between ₹11,946-12,641 crore with 1-7.2% YoY growth. NII expected to rise 6-8% YoY driven by healthy retail and SME loan growth, while NIMs likely to remain stable at 4.3%.

News.Title: LIC Reduces ICICI Bank Stake to 4.73% via Market Sale
News.Summary: Life Insurance Corporation of India disclosed reduction of its shareholding in ICICI Bank from 6.737% to 4.731% through market sale of 12.70 crore shares between December 2020 and January 2026.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Q3FY26 Earnings Call Set for January 17
News.Summary: ICICI Bank announces conference calls with media and analysts on January 17, 2026, to discuss Q3FY26 financial results for quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Q3FY26 Results Call on Jan 17, 2026
News.Summary: ICICI Bank announces earnings call scheduled for January 17, 2026 at 5:00 PM IST to discuss Q3FY26 financial results for quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 1.19M Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank Limited has allotted 1,185,510 equity shares of face value ₹2.00 each under its Employee Stock Option Scheme-2000, approved by Executive Directors on January 13, 2026.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Takes Full Control of Pension Fund Unit
News.Summary: ICICI Bank has acquired complete ownership of ICICI Prudential Pension Funds Management Company, strengthening its position in the pension fund management sector through strategic consolidation.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Completes Pension Fund Acquisition
News.Summary: ICICI Bank successfully acquired 100% shareholding in ICICI Prudential Pension Funds Management Company Limited, making it a wholly owned subsidiary through share purchase agreement execution.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Independent Director Retires After Term
News.Summary: Ms. Neelam Dhawan retired as Independent Director of ICICI Bank on January 11, 2026, following completion of her second term in office.

News.Title: ICICI Bank, JSW Energy Among Top Technical Picks
News.Summary: Anand Rathi's Jigar Patel recommends three stocks for short-term trading as Nifty 50 faces technical challenges near 25,600 support level amid market volatility.

News.Title: ICICI Group Boosts Stakes in 6 Companies During Q3 FY26
News.Summary: ICICI Group increased holdings in KNR Constructions, CAMS, Techno Electric, AWL Agri Business, and Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers during Q3 FY26, with total investment value exceeding ₹2,500 crores.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 115,532 shares valued at ₹16.42 crores, executed at ₹1,421.00 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 353,895 shares valued at ₹50.93 crores, executed at ₹1,439.10 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Gains 6.5% in Four-Day Rally
News.Summary: ICICI Bank shares rise 1.2% on Wednesday, extending winning streak to four sessions with 6.5% total gains. Stock approaches record high of ₹1,500 amid strong analyst support.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 400,834 shares valued at ₹57.18 crores, executed at ₹1,426.60 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a major block trade on NSE involving 265,960 shares valued at ₹37.64 crores, executed at ₹1,415.10 per share, indicating increased institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Prudential Life Gets PFRDA Nod for Pension Unit Sale
News.Summary: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance receives PFRDA approval for sale of 100% stake in pension fund management company to ICICI Bank, completing regulatory clearance for strategic transaction.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 277,454 shares valued at ₹39.19 crores, executed at ₹1,412.60 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 109,772 shares valued at ₹15.37 crores, executed at ₹1,400.00 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹24.19 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 178,497 shares worth ₹24.19 crores at ₹1,355.00 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹26.78 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a major block trade on NSE involving 198,396 shares worth ₹26.78 crores at ₹1,350.00 per share, reflecting increased institutional activity in the banking stock.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Launches Capital Gains Account Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank introduces CGAS facility allowing customers to deposit long-term capital gains with tax exemptions and interest earnings. Scheme available from January 1, 2026 for individuals and HUFs.

News.Title: ICICI Bank, AU SFB positioned well in disciplined credit cycle
News.Summary: Credit growth stabilizing with secured retail and MSME lending as key drivers. PSU banks regain MSME dominance while private banks remain selective. ICICI Bank gets Buy rating with ₹1,700 target.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Board Meet on Jan 17 for Q3FY26 Results
News.Summary: ICICI Bank announces board meeting scheduled for January 17, 2026, to approve Q3FY26 financial results. Trading window closed from January 1-19, 2026 for designated persons.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹338.74 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 2,503,429 shares worth ₹338.74 crores at ₹1,353.10 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity in the banking stock.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Block Trade Worth ₹84.20 Crores on NSE
News.Summary: ICICI Bank witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 617,032 shares valued at ₹84.20 crores, executed at ₹1,364.60 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Earns ₹4,474 Cr Insurance Commissions
News.Summary: ICICI Bank reported insurance commission income of ₹4,474 crores in FY25, representing 7% of the bank's profit before tax, highlighting the significant contribution of bancassurance to overall profitability.

News.Title: Citi Maintains Buy Rating on ICICI Bank at ₹1,700
News.Summary: Citi continues its positive outlook on ICICI Bank with a Buy recommendation and target price of ₹1,700, reflecting confidence in the banking major's prospects.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Completes Acquisition of Additional 2% Stake in ICICI AMC
News.Summary: ICICI Bank has completed the acquisition of up to 2% stake in ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company Limited from Prudential Corporation Holdings Limited, with all closing conditions fulfilled on December 9, 2025 at 8:42 p.m. The Bank now holds 53.0% of ICICI AMC's paid-up equity share capital, strengthening its position in the asset management subsidiary.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 503,178 Equity Shares Under Employee Stock Option Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank allotted 503,178 equity shares with face value of Rs. 2 each under its Employee Stock Option Scheme-2000, with approval from two Executive Directors. The allotment was made using powers delegated by the Board of Directors from their October 21, 2023 meeting.

News.Title: ICICI Bank to Acquire Up to 2% Stake in ICICI Prudential Asset Management
News.Summary: ICICI Bank plans to purchase up to 2% stake in ICICI Prudential Asset Management, with the asset valued at 21.4 billion rupees. The acquisition will increase the bank's ownership in its asset management subsidiary.

News.Title: ICICI Bank Allots 23,226 Equity Shares Under Employee Stock Unit Scheme
News.Summary: ICICI Bank allotted 23,226 equity shares with face value of ₹2 each on December 05, 2025, under the ICICI Bank Employees Stock Unit Scheme-2022. The allotment was approved by two Executive Directors and affects employee shareholders participating in the stock unit scheme.

News.Title: Moody's Affirms ICICI Bank's Baa3 Credit Ratings with Stable Outlook
News.Summary: Moody's Ratings reaffirmed ICICI Bank's Baa3 long-term deposit ratings and baseline credit assessment with a stable outlook, citing the bank's diversified loan portfolio and above-industry-average profitability. The affirmation reflects expectations that ICICI's strong retail franchise, access to low-cost deposits, and superior profitability metrics will support internal capital generation and maintain strong solvency.
